tab1.text1:
We are a family friendly server ran by friendly and experienced staff. We've created a server with mostly low boosts, however breeding has been boosted significantly. Make yourself feel at home and we hope you enjoy your time with us!

Below are our rules:

CHARACTERS AND TRIBES
- The default names Human or Humano are not allowed. If you made this mistake please contact an admin on Discord for it to be changed.
- You must create a tribe even if you are solo.

BEHAVIOUR AND COMMON COURTESY
- Do not pick players up on a flyer with intent to harm them.
- Do not harass, stalk or be abusive towards any player.
- Use of racist or highly offensive language in chat will result in a ban.

BUILDS, BASES AND TAMES
- Pick up all traps after use.
- Keep your base within a (TBC) foundation radius in all directions.
- One base per tribe per map. This includes water pens, we plan on adding a public water pen for all to use.
- Keep our obelisks and community centres free from tames, storage boxes etc.
- Do not block access to artifact caves, high resource spawns or anywhere players need to go.

Discord is not a requirement but joining and registering will serve as your insurance in-case of future issues as admin will be able to contact you easier, we will not chase after rule-breakers.
We will only provide support for those who open a ticket on Discord.
You can also see more in-depth information and become a part of our community.
http://discord.gg/Z9vv88GykB

Controller players need to hold square(PS) or x(XBOX) to see this message again.
